New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets and scored 13 runs,Babar Azam scored 32 not out,Pakistan won the match by 3 wickets
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi dismissed Andrew Balbirnie and Lorcan Tucker in the first over,Pakistan needed 107 to win after 20 overs,Babar Azam and Saim Ayub fell early, but Pakistan managed to chase down the target with 7 balls to spare,Ireland's Gareth Delany and Joshua Little formed an unbeaten last-wicket partnership of 26 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and chose to bowl,Babar Azam was crucial in guiding Pakistan through a nervy chase
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam said Pakistan had areas to improve but praised the team's spirit,Paul Stirling highlighted Ireland's fight but acknowledged their struggles
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Lauderhill, a venue that had previously seen three washouts,Ireland ended the tournament without a win,The match was a dead rubber as both teams had already been eliminated from the Super Eights
Others: The Guardian provided in-depth live coverage of the match,The article included detailed over-by-over updates and key events
